entry.tran: 不思悔改的；不悔悟的；不知羞耻的
entry.def: If you are unrepentant, you are not ashamed of your beliefs or actions.

example.ex: Pamela was unrepentant about her strong language and abrasive remarks.
example.tran: 帕梅拉对自己那些脏话和伤人的言辞一点也不感到羞愧。
